VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndSiteHour: Site time — hour (time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndUTCMinute: Time in UTC — minute (time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitStartUTCMinute: Time in UTC — minute (start of visit)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndUTCDate: Time in UTC — date (time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndUTCDayOfMonth: Time in UTC — day of month (time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndUTCDayOfWeek: Time in UTC — day of week (time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndUTCDayOfYear: Time in UTC — day of year (time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndUTCQuarter: Time in UTC — quarter (time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndUTCSecond: Time in UTC — second (Time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndUTCWeekOfYear: Time in UTC — week of year (time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndUTCMonth: Time in UTC — month (time of last action)
VisitTime.ColumnVisitEndUTCYear: Time in UTC — year (time of last action)
VisitTime.PluginDescription: Reports the local time and the server time of when your visitors view your website or app.
VisitTime.SiteTime: Visits per hour in the site's timezone
VisitTime.VisitsByDayOfWeek: Visits by day of the week
VisitTime.WidgetByDayOfWeekDocumentation: This graph shows the number of visits your website received on each day of the week.
VisitTime.WidgetLocalTimeDocumentation: This graph shows what time it was in the %1$s visitors' time zones %2$s during their visits.
VisitTime.WidgetSiteTimeDocumentation: This graph shows what time it was in the %1$s site's time zone %2$s during the visits.
VisitTime.TimesSubcategoryHelp: The "Times" section shows when people visit your site. Popular local times helps you cater your site to their lives. The most popular server times reveals technical demand.
